personalInfo.name: Giyosiddin Ubaydullayev
personalInfo.description: Specialist in creating AI, Web, and Mobile applications. I create innovative solutions with modern technologies.

projects.title: Memora AI
projects.description: A system for detecting Alzheimer's disease from MRI images using artificial intelligence. Distinguishes 4 stages (Healthy, Very Mild, Moderate, Severe) with 98% accuracy. Helps doctors diagnose through Grad-CAM visualization.

projects.title: Smart OCR
projects.description: Intelligent document analysis system using AI. Reads data from images or scanned documents and converts to digital format. Processes certificates, contracts, and other documents in seconds.
features: Export to JSON and table format

projects.title: Visara AI
projects.description: Visual search system - ability to search for products from images when the name is unknown. Finds prices and sellers from marketplaces (OLX, Uzum, etc.). Ideal solution for shopping and spare parts search.

projects.title: Mobile App
projects.description: Mobile app designed for Central Asian users. Multi-language support (Uzbek, Kazakh, Kyrgyz, Tajik, Turkmen) and modern UI/UX design. Coming soon!
